mapper.insert: insert into ask (writer, asknum, askcontents, askdate, f_num, e_num, asktitle, ask_state) values(#{writer}, ask_seq.nextval, #{askcontents}, sysdate, #{f_num}, #{e_num}, #{asktitle}, '답변중')
mapper.select: select writer, asktitle, askdate, answercontents, answerdate, asknum, ad_num from ask where f_num = #{f_num} order by askdate desc
select writer, asktitle, askdate , answercontents, answerdate, asknum, ad_num from ask where e_num = #{e_num} order by askdate desc
select answertitle, answercontents, ad_num, answerdate from ask where asknum = #{asknum}
